measure.name: coil_cooling_dx_two_speed_percent_change
measure.display_name: Cooling Coils DX Two Speed Percent Change
measure.description: This is a general purpose measure to calibrate DX Cooling Coils with a Percent Change.
measure.modeler_description: It will be used for calibration of rated capacity and efficiency and parasitic loads. User can choose between a Two coil or ALL the Coils.

argument.name: coil
argument.display_name: Apply the Measure to a Two DX Cooling Coil, ALL the DX Cooling Coils or NONE.

argument.name: rated_highspeed_cop_perc_change
argument.display_name: Percent Change for High Speed COP.
argument.description: Percent Change for High Speed COP.

argument.name: rated_lowspeed_cop_perc_change
argument.display_name: Percent Change for Low Speed COP.
argument.description: Percent Change for Low Speed COP.

argument.name: rated_highspeed_cooling_capacity_perc_change
argument.display_name: Percent Change for High Speed coil cooling Capacity.
argument.description: Percent Change for High Speed coil cooling Capacity.

argument.name: rated_lowspeed_cooling_capacity_perc_change
argument.display_name: Percent Change for Low Speed coil cooling Capacity.
argument.description: Percent Change for Low Speed coil cooling Capacity.
